job.title: Network Engineer // Cisco // DFW
job.description: Motion Recruitment is partnering up with a global leader in Infrastructure Services to help them bring on a Cisco Network Engineer This will be a 3 month contracttohire position in Irving TexasltbrgtltbrgtAs a Cisco Network Engineer your scope of work will involve new virtual ASA configurations within a cloud environment for disaster recovery servicesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtSkills ampamp Experienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt3 years of Network Administration experience routers switches firewallsltligtltligtExperience supporting Cisco network infrastructure and devicesltligtltligtExpertise with Cisco Routing and Switching  Catalyst series required Nexxus a plusltligtltligtExperience with Wireless LAN Controllers WLCs WAPsltligtltligtBasic troubleshooting and supporting firewalls Cisco ASA  Firepower Palo Alto CheckpointltligtltligtCCNA or CCNPltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtThe OfferltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtCompetitive Pay Up to 60hr DOEltligtltligtContract Duration 3 month contracttohireltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtYou Will Receive The Following BeneftsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtMedical ampamp Dental InsuranceltligtltligtHealth Savings Account HSAltligtltligtPaid Time OffltligtltligtPretax Commuter BenefitsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtPosted Byltstronggt Carolyn Regimballtbrgtltbrgt
